Articles.Content:
I bought this game yesterday, can't remember how I found it actually (possibly by roaming around on Steam), but I have been doing almost nothing else but play this game since I got it. Absolutely amazing!

I rage quit one time tho, because I couldnt get the thrusters to work properly (got it under control now... almost atleast).

To the Mun and back! (thank god for the little jet packs, I forgot the friggin ladder on my first go ).
Welcome to the ksp forums, hope you are enjoying the game on steam. Feel free to ask questions about gameplay here on the forums. We are happy to help.
Welcome! There are all sorts of little tricks and tips you'll learn about from the other players here. Be sure to take some screenshots along the way! We love those here

Welcome to the community Ildpind

Also Kerbals can jump really high on the Mun! Aiming them though, that's hard

Have fun learning the game and fly safe!
